## Ciphertext

<CodeBlockWithLength code={
``
}
/>

The initial steps of this cipher have been discovered by <Username name="JessesOcean" type="discord"/>. The steps are:

1. Decrypt with RC4 using key `Zombies` (capital Z). This results in an octal sequence.
2. Decode the octal. This provides a hexadecimal string.

The current ciphertext is now:

<CodeBlockWithLength code={
``
}
/>

| Field | Value |
| :-- | :-- |
| Location | Shangri La, on top of part of the starting room center ruins. |
| Encoding | Hexadecimal |
| Known techniques | RC4, base conversion |
| Bytes | 1867 |
